hibernate-mapping.query: select distinct count(*) from omis.courtdocument.domain.CourtDocumentAssociation courtDocumentAssociation left join courtDocumentAssociation.docket docket left join docket.court court left join courtDocumentAssociation.offender offender where docket.person = :offender or offender = :offender

select distinct new omis.courtdocument.report.CourtDocumentAssociationSummary( courtDocumentAssociation.id, document.date, docket.value, court.name, category.name, document.title, name.firstName, name.lastName, name.middleName, creationSignature.date, offName.firstName, offName.lastName, offName.middleName, offender.offenderNumber) from omis.courtdocument.domain.CourtDocumentAssociation courtDocumentAssociation left join courtDocumentAssociation.document document left join courtDocumentAssociation.docket docket left join docket.court court left join courtDocumentAssociation.category category left join document.creationSignature creationSignature left join creationSignature.userAccount.user.name name left join courtDocumentAssociation.offender offender left join offender.name offName where docket.person = :offender

select distinct new omis.courtdocument.report.CourtDocumentAssociationSummary( courtDocumentAssociation.id, document.date, '', '', category.name, document.title, name.firstName, name.lastName, name.middleName, creationSignature.date, offName.firstName, offName.lastName, offName.middleName, offender.offenderNumber) from omis.courtdocument.domain.CourtDocumentAssociation courtDocumentAssociation left join courtDocumentAssociation.document document left join courtDocumentAssociation.category category left join document.creationSignature creationSignature left join creationSignature.userAccount.user.name name left join courtDocumentAssociation.offender offender left join offender.name offName where offender = :offender and courtDocumentAssociation.docket is null
